1.content: One day as you were on your way home from school, a strange beam of light shot out of one of the houses hitting you. Suddenly you started feeling very dizzy. When you came to, you found that you had shrunk down to less than a foot tall. You then realize than you were an inch tall. You then decide that it is best to look for one of your friends. Who do you find?
1.title: Beginning

info.brief_description: Donovan is shrunk somehow and needs help to grow back.
info.description:
I have made this story 18+. First off you are the main character Donovan. Donovan was on his way home after school and finds out he was shrunken down to an inch tall. He must find someone who could help him. Here are the characters.

Donovan(you): age-16
Male, has lots of friends, has a girlfriend.

Skylar: donovan's girlfriend and one of his best friends. She would like to have fun with you before helping you. She is 15 years old.

Bre: donovan's friend. She would want to help no matter what. She is 17.

Amanda: amanda is another one of donovan's friends. She would not want to help you but instead keep you as her slave. She is 15.

Rules are simple
No foot play
Donovan must stay one inch tall till the end of the story

You are able to add a few more girls to the story as long as they are between 14 and 19 years of age.

Things i will allow
Breasts
Vore
Anal
Slavery

Donovan is the only one who shrinks. No growing or shrinking girls. Please don't go overboard on the chapters. No male to male interaction. Male to female interaction is allowed. Donovan is the only boy in the story. Plus no one sentence chapters. Keep it at least one paragraph long.
